Apple TV+ Hadir di Indonesia, Ini Tarif dan Cara Nontonnya
02 Nov 2019, 11:26 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Foto: Adi Fida Rahman/detikINET

Jakarta - Setelah diperkenalkan beberapa bulan lalu, layanan Apple TV+ sudah bisa dinikmati, termasuk di Indonesia. Berikut barlangganannya dan bagaimana cara menontonnya.Di Tanah Air, Apple TV+ dibanderol Rp 69 ribu per bulan. Atau bila mau berhemat bisa membayar langanan setahun dengan tarif Rp 699 ribu per tahun. Mahal? Tentu saja tidak. Karena biaya berlangganan itu bisa diperuntukkan enam orang yang terdaftar dalam Family Sharing. Artinya per orang dikenakan Rp 11.500.Bagi kamu yang membeli perangkat iPhone, iPad, Apple TV, iPod Touch, Mac setelah 10 September akan diberikan langganan Apple TV+ gratis selama setahun. Selain itu para mereka yang berlangganggan Apple Music untuk pelajar juga diberikan langganan gratis.


Tarif belangganan Apple TV+ di Indonesia. Foto: Adi Fida Rahman/detikINET

Layanan pesaing Netflix ini bisa dinikmati lewat aplikasi Apple TV di perangkat:- iPhone, iPod Touch dan iPad yang telah menjalankan iOS 12.3 dan terbaru- Apple TV yang telah menjalankan tvOS 12.3 ke atas- Perangkat Mac yang sudah menjalankan macOS Catalina- Roku- Amazon Fire TV- Jajaran televisi Samsung


Tersedia terjemahan bahasa Indonesia. Foto: Adi Fida Rahman/detikINET

Raksasa teknologi asal Cupertino itu memastikan menghadirkan aplikasi Apple TV di jajaran televisi besutan LG, Sony dan VIZIO. Selain itu jajaran perangkat yang mendukung AirPlay 2 akan pula diberikan dukungan akhir tahun nanti.Saat dirilis cukup banyak konten yang sudah bisa dinikmati. Ada Morning Wars yang dibintangi Jennifer Aniston, See yang dimainkan oleh Jason Mamoa dan lainnya.Konten-konten Apple TV+ menyediakan terjemahan dalam bahasa Indonesia dan SDH (teks untuk tuna rungu) . Mendukung resolusi 4K dan HDR. Simak Video "Apple Tutup Gate, Ratusan Orang Menginap di Apple Orchard"[Gambas:Video 20detik](afr/afr)

Apple TV + Comes to Indonesia, Here Are the Rates and How to Watch it
02 Nov 2019, 11:26 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Photo: Adi Fida Rahman / detikINET

Jakarta - After being introduced a few months ago, Apple TV + services can already be enjoyed, including in Indonesia. Here's the subscription and how to watch it. In the country, Apple TV + is priced at Rp. 69 thousand per month. Or if you want to save money you can pay a year's fee at a rate of Rp 699 thousand per year. Expensive? Of course not. Because the subscription fee can be allocated to six people registered in Family Sharing. This means that per person is charged Rp 11,500. For those of you who buy an iPhone, iPad, Apple TV, iPod Touch, Mac device after September 10, you will be given a free Apple TV + subscription for a year. In addition, those who have Apple Music subscriptions for students are also given a free subscription.


Apple TV + subscription rates in Indonesia. Photo: Adi Fida Rahman / detikINET

This Netflix competitor service can be enjoyed through the Apple TV application on the device: - iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad that are running iOS 12.3 and later - Apple TV that has run tvOS 12.3 and above - Mac devices that have run macOS Catalina-Roku-Amazon Fire TV- Samsung Television lineup


Indonesian translation available. Photo: Adi Fida Rahman / detikINET

The tech giant from Cupertino ensured presenting the Apple TV application in the television lineup made by LG, Sony and VIZIO. In addition, the line of devices that support AirPlay 2 will also be given support later this year. When released quite a lot of content that can be enjoyed. There is Morning Wars, starring Jennifer Aniston, See, played by Jason Mamoa and others. Apple TV + content content provides translations in Indonesian and SDH (text for the hearing impaired). Supports 4K and HDR resolutions. Check out the video "Apple Close the Gate, Hundreds of People Stay at Apple Orchard" [Gambas: Video 20sec] (afr / afr)
